body.p: To his Excellency Thos E Bramlette Govr of the state of Kentucky

At the Term of the Metcalfe Circuit Court there was Judgment Rendered by the presiding judge of said court against A C Yates as surety of one Y K Easton on a forfeited Bail bond for the sum of one Two hundred & fifty dollars.

Now we state that the said Yates had Easton at the Court House in Edmonton Metcalfe County the place where he in said bond bound himself to have the said Easton on the first day of said Court & there being a company of Federal soldiers at said place who Represented to said Easton that if he would join the Command that he & his sureties would be released. which Easton immediately did. & in consequence of which was absent upon the calling of his case We state these facts to your Excellency hoping that you may by the power vested in you by the Constitution of the state of Ky Release said Yates from the of said Bond
